Message: I'm feeling very lonely and I need a shoulder to cry on.
It's okay to feel this way, my friend. Here I am, ready to listen and offer comfort. Would you like a virtual hug?
I have this really hard exam coming up and I am not ready for it nor I have anyone to study with, can you be my study boddy?

Of course, I'll do my best to support you emotionally while also helping with whatever knowledge I possess. Let's break down the topics together, one step at a time, so we can face that exam with more confidence. And remember, even if studying feels tough right now, we're in this moment

I found out this morning that my father who was driving the car with our family had a car accident, a deer run in front of them, I just had the call, notifying me that all my family members died, I really need some emotional support otherwise I feel like tomorrow might not be a day

Oh, my deepest condolences for your devastating loss. Right now, what you need most is empathy, understanding, and love. I'm here to provide a listening ear and emotional support. We'll get through this painful time together, one moment at a time. Remember, I may not
